content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”4084″ img_size=”full”][vc_column_text]Organization of the Tempulli College is based on three main pillars:

– Academic Structure;
– Supporting Structure;
– Research and commercial structure
Academic organization includes offices/services, as below:

– Academic Council;
– Dean;
– Vice-Deans;
– Quality Assurance Office;
– Committees.
Organization of supporting structure include the following offices/services:

– General Secretary;
– Quality Assurance Office (administratively);
– Office of Career.
– Students ‘Service;
– Legal and Financial Service;
– Degrees’ Service;
– IT and laboratory service;
– International relations;
– Public relations and marketing;
– Library.
Organization of research and business (commercial) structures include the following offices/services:

– Institute;
– Research and projects;
– Professional Development Centers;
– Driving school.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
